Animated Ice Mace/Flail (Male)
kDesc
Fashioned within the freezing forge of frost. A chilling aura emits from its head. [#Legal]
Forgée avec la puissance du gel. L'extrémité de la masse dégage une aura de froid mordant. [#Legal]
In der eisigen Schmiede des Frostes geformt. Die Spitze hat eine kühle Aura. [#Legal]
Modellata in una raggelante forgia di ghiaccio. Fiamme erompono dalla sommità. [#Legal]
Creada dentro de la gélida forja de escarcha. De su cabeza emana un aura gélida. [#Legal]
빙하에서 태어나고, 영원한 서리로 담금질한 무기입니다. 섬뜩한 냉기가 느껴집니다. [#Legal]
Fashioned within the freezing forge of frost. Flames blaze from its head. [#Legal]
於刺骨冰霜中成形，前端發出寒氣。[#Legal]
於刺骨冰霜中成形，前端發出寒氣。[#Legal]
Fashioned within the freezing forge of frost. A chilling aura emits from its head. [#Legal]
